de.tudarmstadt.ukp.clarin.webanno.api

Interface AnnotationService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AnnotationServiceImpl

    public interface AnnotationService
    This interface contains methods which are related to TagSet, Tag and Type for the annotation project .
    Author:
    Seid Muhie Yimam, Richard Eckart de Castilho

    • Method Detail

      • createTag

        @PreAuthorize(value="hasAnyRole(\'ROLE_ADMIN\',\'ROLE_USER\')")
void createTag(Tag tag,
                          User user)
               throws IOException
        creates a Tag for a given TagSet. Combination of tag name and tagset name should be unique
        Parameters:
        tag -
        user - The User who perform this operation
        Throws:
        IOException

      • createTagSet

                             User user)
                  throws IOException
        creates a TagSet object in the database
        Parameters:

        user - The User who perform this operation

      • createType

        @PreAuthorize(value="hasAnyRole(\'ROLE_ADMIN\',\'ROLE_USER\')")
void createType(AnnotationType type)
        creates a type which will be a span or arc(relation) type. Currently the annotation types are highly highly tied with the tagsets, one tagset per type. POS, Names Entity, and coreference links are span types while coreference chains and dependency parsings are arc(relation) types.
        Parameters:
        type -

      • getTag

        tagSet -
        Returns:

                  Project project)
        Get a a TagSet for a given AnnotationType. One Tagset per annotation type

        Returns:
